橜字的基本解释

橜
jué
古同“橛”。

橜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》其月切，入月，羣。］
亦作“橜1”。
(1)木橛子；短木桩。
(2)喻指桩状物。
(3)门中竖立以为限隔的短木。
(4)树木或禾杆的残根。
(5)即马嚼子。马口中所衔的横木。后亦用金属制成。
(6)用同“倔”。倔强。
(7)折断。
(8)秃。参见“橛筆”。
(9)量词。犹段，截。
(10)敲打。
(11)犹掘。
(12)犹翘起，鼓起。
(13)倒，颠仆。参见“橛痿”。

橜字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橜； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页554第04
同橛。

橜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
橜字的起名意思

暂无。

橜
Basic explanation of words
橜
jué
The ancient same "pron".
橜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" its month cut, enter the month, group. ]
Also known as "橜1".
(1) Wooden prongs; short stakes.
(2) Yu refers to piles.
(3) A short log erected in the door as a barrier.
(4) Residual roots of trees or straws.
(5) That is, horse bites. The crossbar held in the horse's mouth. Later also made of metal.
(6) Use the same as "stubborn". stubborn.
(7) Broken.
(8) Baldness. See "prong pen".
(9) Quantifiers. Still paragraph, cut off.
(10) Beat.
(11) Still digging.
(12) Still cocked and bulged.
(13) Upside down, upside down. See "Punyi".
橜

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橜; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 554 04
The same prong.
